H0.text: Tell the teacher about the bottle and liquid is the action a student in science class should take when finding an unlabeled bottle containing a liquid for safety purposes.

H1.text: Pouring the liquid down the drain is what a student in science class should do when they find an unlabeled bottle containing a liquid, for safety purposes.

H2.text: Compare the liquid to other liquids for safety purposes when a student in science class finds an unlabeled bottle containing a liquid.

H3.text: Finding the mass of the bottle and liquid is the safety action a student in science class should take when discovering an unlabeled bottle containing a liquid.
